title: The synergistic catalysis effect on electrochemical nitrate reduction at the dual−function active sites of heterostructure
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00784K, Paper
Yuxiang Li, Zhenjie Lu, Lei Zheng, Xing Yan, Junliang Xie, Zhonghao Yu, Shengli Zhang, Fang Jiang, Huan Chen
The advanced design concept of catalyst to drive efficient electrochemical nitrate reduction reaction (NITRR) is highly desirable for converting the harmful nitrate (NO3−) to ammonia (NH3) as hydrogen carrier. Here,...
